definition: (idiom) dead end/road to ruin
to die/impassable/uncrossable/inflexible/rigid/extremely/damned
road/CL:條|条[tiao2]/journey/route/line (bus etc)/sort/kind
surname Lu
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)

sentences.english: Capitalism is a dead end;there is no future for it.
sentences.chinese: 資本主義是死路一條，那裏根本沒有未來可言。

sentences.english: Companies that do not belong to a community of discourse will die.
sentences.chinese: 企業若不能參與到尚存論說的羣體中，只有死路一條。

sentences.english: Because of the economic times in buyer's market, not sale has blind lane only.
sentences.chinese: 因爲在買方市場的經濟時代，不營銷只有死路一條。

sentences.english: You're hungry, thirsty and eventually you'll die.
sentences.chinese: 你又飢又渴，最終死路一條。

sentences.english: I'll seek you out, flay you alive. One more word and you won't survive.
sentences.chinese: 我要找到你，生吞活剝，總而言之死路一條。

sentences.english: Rule number one: Trial is war, second place is death.
sentences.chinese: 法庭即戰場，輸家死路一條。

sentences.english: North and south home and said blue revolting, rice said that is a dead end.
sentences.chinese: 南北迴家和米藍說鬧革命，米藍說那是死路一條。

sentences.english: Why do men have to enter the tomb to the end then?
sentences.chinese: 有人說婚姻是墳墓，踏進去只有死路一條。

sentences.english: It is fatal to enter any war without the will to win it.
sentences.chinese: 沒有求勝的慾望，進行任何戰爭都只能是死路一條。

definition: without a retreat route/caught in a dead end/having burned one's bridges
to submit to the will of heaven/to resign oneself to fate/to trust to luck
brains
debt of gratitude
lit. wind past your ear/fig. sth you don't pay much attention to/in one ear and out the other
(not) a single person/(no) one
lit. to drive a duck onto a perch (idiom)/fig. to push sb to do sth way beyond their ability
lit. drinking poison in the hope of quenching one's thirst (idiom)/fig. a supposed remedy that only makes matters worse
to die without a burial site/to die a pauper/a tragic end
pinyin: si3 wu2 zang4 shen1 zhi1 di4

definition: to let emotions affect one's decisions
lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
confused/vague/indistinct/muddle-headed/mixed up/in a daze
traitor to one's love/heartless rat
ability/skill
to make a terrible scene (idiom)/to throw a tantrum
pinyin: yi1 ku1 er4 nao4 san1 shang4 diao4

definition: to define
